channel.title: ::rules command [PI]
channel.description: Can anyone tell me how to add a ::rules command? I know how to make it appear in the chat box. But i want it to pop on a scroll. wich covers ur whole screen not just the chat box.

item.title: ::rules command [PI]
item.dc:creator: @runewings317 runewings317
item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

Oh I forgot to tell you. If you get errors, you need to put “c.” in front of some of the lines!

item.title: ::rules command [PI]
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“expozee, post:4, topic:398343”]for pi try adding it under
commands.java

here’s one for example took it out of project fatality

if (playerCommand.startsWith(“rules”)) {
c.sendMessage("");
c.sendMessage("");
c.sendMessage("");
c.sendMessage("");
c.sendMessage("");
c.sendMessage(");
c.sendMessage("");
c.sendMessage("");
c.sendMessage("");
}[/quote]
when i add that it just sends me a bunch of messages in the chat box and i need one that pops up and covers there whole screen

item.title: ::rules command [PI]
item.dc:creator: @runewings317 runewings317
item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

public void ruleInterface() { clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("", 3024);//Close Text sendQuest("", 3026);//Line 1 sendQuest("", 3027);//Line 2 sendQuest("", 3028);//Line 3 sendQuest("", 3029);//Line 4 sendQuest("", 3030);//Line 5 sendQuest("", 3031);//Line 6 sendQuest("", 3032);//Line 7 sendQuest("", 3033);//Line 8 sendQuest("", 3034);//Line 9 sendQuest("", 3035);//Line 10 sendQuest("", 3036);//Line 11 sendQuest("", 3037);//Line 12 showInterface(3023); flushOutStream(); }
This is a stone interface by I Sam I but it works :P.

Here is the command code:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("item")) { ruleInterface(); }
